Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GUIIsland

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIIsland
public class GUIIsland extends Object
Class GUIIsland renders the island's elements on the screen For each island, a GUIIsland instance is created

  • Constructor Details

    • GUIIsland

      public GUIIsland(int index, double x, double y, double width, double height, double angle, GameTableController controller, GUI gui)

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render()
      Method render renders the island image and populates it with students,towers and mother nature If the game is in expert mode, personality bans could also be added

    • setPos

      public void setPos(double x, double y)

    • setSize

      public void setSize(double width, double height)

    • setCenter

      private void setCenter()

    • clearIsland

      public void clearIsland()
      Method clearIsland removes all the images from the island

    • setEvents

      public void setEvents()
      Method setEvents sets up all the mouse/drag and drop events for the island image. If a student is dropped on the island, this will be rendered on it. If a student image of the same color has already been rendered, then no image will be added but the corresponding tooltip will be updated

    • addStudentToIsland

      private void addStudentToIsland(Color student)
      Method addStudentToIsland adds to the hashmap color->number of students a new student, given by the parameter. Finally populateStudents() is called, to refresh student images and tooltips
      Parameters:
      student - is the color to add to the hashmap

    • initializeNumOfStudents

      private void initializeNumOfStudents()
      Method initializeNumOfStudents sets up the hashmap which associates Color->number of students according to the GameBoard current status. This data structure can be modified freely on client side by drag n drop events, because the copy from server is stored in GameBoard instance

    • populateStudents

      public void populateStudents()
      Method populateStudents adds all the students images to the island accordingly to the client-side hashmap. If a drag n drop event has added one or more students to the island, they will be rendered even if these are not on the island, server-side. This is done to preview what the island will look like if the player decides to confirm his action

    • clearStudents

      private void clearStudents()
      Method clearLobby removes all the student images from the screen

    • populateMotherNature

      public void populateMotherNature()
      Method populateMotherNature adds mother nature image to the island This will be displayed if and only if this island has mother nature on it

    • clearMotherNature

      private void clearMotherNature()
      Method clearMotherNature removes mother nature image from the screen

    • populateTowers

      public void populateTowers()
      Method populateTowers adds tower images to the island

    • populateBans

      public void populateBans()
      Method populateBans adds personality ban images to the island

    • clearBans

      private void clearBans()
      Method clearBans removes personality ban images from the island

    • clearTowers

      private void clearTowers()
      Method clearTowers removes tower images from the island

    • setStudentsTooltip

      private void setStudentsTooltip(Color color, javafx.scene.image.ImageView studentImage)
      Method setStudentsTooltip sets up/updates tooltip installed on a student image
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of the students associated with the tooltip to update
      studentImage - is the student image reference on which the tooltip is installed

    • setTowersTooltip

      private void setTowersTooltip()
      Method setTowersTooltip sets up/updates tooltip installed on the tower image

    • setImageEffect

      public void setImageEffect(javafx.scene.effect.Effect effect)

    • setClientIsland

      public void setClientIsland(ClientIsland clientIsland)
